nodes.text: An audio sensor, auditory sensor, audio receptor, auditory sensor recorder or sound sensor was a type of sensor that detected the sort of atmospheric vibrations that organic beings perceived as sound. They were able to detect frequencies in a broader range than organic hearing devices. Audio sensors were colloquially referred to as audio pickups or auditory pickups.
These sensors were featured on many droid models, such as Holowan Laboratories IG-88 assassin droid models.
Audio sensors could be mounted externally on starships, to relay sound from outside the ship so it could be heard by someone inside it.
